numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows a higher percentage of players of colour than head coaches of colour.
2. The graph shows a lower percentage of players of colour in the baseball league.
3. The graph shows a lower percentage of head coaches of colour in the baseball league.
4. We wonder why there are fewer head coaches of colour than players of colour.
5. There is a low percentage of people of colour in higher positions.
6. A head coach is a higher position.
8. More representation of people of colour is needed in these jobs.
9. The graph compares the percentages of players of colour and head coaches of colour in different sports leagues.
10. The title is: The Colour of Sports.
